textBeforeTable: Council on Meetings and Professional Development Go back to Council List }); }); return false; // return false so any link destination is not followed jQuery(this).parent().next('.legacy-cc-toggle').toggle('slow'); //$('.toggle').hide();$('a.toggleLink').html(showText); // toggle the display - uncomment the next line for a basic "accordion" style jQuery(this).html( (!is_visible) ? showText : hideText); // change the link depending on whether the element is shown or hidden is_visible = !is_visible; // switch visibility jQuery('a.toggleLink').click(function() { // capture clicks on the toggle links jQuery('.legacy-cc-toggle').hide(); // hide all of the elements with a class of 'toggle' jQuery('.legacy-cc-toggle').prev().append(' ('+showText+')'); // append show/hide links to the element directly preceding the element with a class of "toggle" var is_visible = false; // initialise the visibility check var hideText='Hide'; var showText='Show'; // choose text for the show/hide link - can contain HTML (e.g. an image) jQuery(document).ready(function() { // this tells jquery to run the function below once the DOM is ready // Latest version @ http://andylangton.co.uk/jquery-show-hide // Andy Langton's show/hide/mini-accordion - updated 23/11/2009 Council and Committees List Governance » Council and Committees List About MAA » Home » You are here
textAfterTable: Dr. James A Sellers Member 2/01/2013 1/31/2016 Ex Offico, Chair, Invited Paper Sessions Jody M Sorensen Member 2/01/2013 1/31/2016 Ex Officio, Chair of Panels, Poster and Workshops Prof. Gerard A Venema Member 1/01/2014 1/31/2019 Ex Officio, Associate Secretary Committee Charges 2/04/2011 The Council on Meetings and Professional Development will: Oversee professional development activities provided to MAA members, including those at national meetings. Suggest new opportunities for professional development. Coordinate and support the work of those committees devoted to professional development and meetings. Coordinate the planning of each national meeting by working with the appropriate program and other committees. Make recommendations for implementing strategic planning recommendations. ad hoc Committee on the Distinguished Lecture Series Member Position Term Begins Term Ends Comments Joseph A Gallian Chair 2/01/2015 1/31/2018 2nd term Dr. Linda Braddy Member 1/01/2015 1/31/2018 Ex Officio, Deputy Executive Director Mr John F Mahoney Member 1/01/2015 1/31/2018 Dr. Amy E Shell-Gellasch Member 1/01/2015 1/31/2018 ad hoc Invited Addresses For JMM 2016 Seattle, WA Member Position Term Begins Term Ends Comments James J Tattersall Chair 1/01/2014 1/31/2017 James H Freeman Member 1/01/2014 1/31/2016 Emilie A
